titleStmt.title: A new declaration and remonstrance of the inhabitants of South-Wales. With the last transactions between the Scots and their King, and other remarkable intelligence of the proceedings of the Kirke Parliament and Army of Scotland. Also, the Lord Deputy of Irelands summons sent to General Preston Governor of Waterford, and General Prestons answer thereunto. Together with a message from the Prince of Orange to the magistrates of Amsterdam,

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J.C. and are to be sold at the Royal Exchange, and without Cripplegate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
